   21: %%
   22: -module(ssl_cert_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: -behaviour(ct_suite).
   25: 
   26: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   28: -include("ssl_record.hrl").
   29: 
   30: %% Common test
   31: -export([all/0,
   32:          groups/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          init_per_group/2,
   35:          init_per_testcase/2,
   36:          end_per_suite/1,
   37:          end_per_group/2,
   38:          end_per_testcase/2
   39:         ]).
   40: 
   41: %% Test cases
   42: -export([no_auth/0,
   43:          no_auth/1,
   44:          auth/0,
   45:          auth/1,
   46:          client_auth_custom_key/0,
   47:          client_auth_custom_key/1,
   48:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/0,
   49:          client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,
   50:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/0,
   51:          client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,
   52:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/0,
   53:          client_auth_no_suitable_chain/1,
   54:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/0,
   55:          client_auth_use_partial_chain/1,
   56:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/0,
   57:          client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain/1,
   58:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/0,
   59:          client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail/1,
   60:          client_auth_sni/0,
   61:          client_auth_sni/1,
   62:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/0,
   63:          client_auth_seelfsigned_peer/1,
   64:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/0,
   65:          missing_root_cert_no_auth/1,
   66:          missing_root_cert_auth/0,
   67:          missing_root_cert_auth/1,
   68:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/0,
   69:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept/1,
   70:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/0,
   71:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject/1,
   72:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/0,
   73:          missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept/1,
   74:          verify_fun_always_run_client/0,
   75:          verify_fun_always_run_client/1,
   76:          verify_fun_always_run_server/0,
   77:          verify_fun_always_run_server/1,
   78:          incomplete_chain_auth/0,
   79:          incomplete_chain_auth/1,
   80:          no_chain_client_auth/0,
   81:          no_chain_client_auth/1,
   82:          invalid_signature_client/0,
   83:          invalid_signature_client/1,
   84:          invalid_signature_server/0,
   85:          invalid_signature_server/1,
   86:          critical_extension_auth/0,
   87:          critical_extension_auth/1,
   88:          critical_extension_client_auth/0,
   89:          critical_extension_client_auth/1,
   90:          critical_extension_no_auth/0,
   91:          critical_extension_no_auth/1,
   92:          extended_key_usage_auth/0,
   93:          extended_key_usage_auth/1,
   94:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/0,
   95:          extended_key_usage_client_auth/1,
   96:          cert_expired/0,
   97:          cert_expired/1,
   98:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/0,
   99:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext/1,
  100:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/0,
  101:          no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment/1,
  102:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/0,
  103:          unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth/1,

  105:          unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth/1,
  106:          longer_chain/0,

  111:          expired_root_with_cross_signed_root/1,

  121:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted/1,

  123:          hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected/1,

  126:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/0,
  127:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1/1,
  128:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/0,
  129:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1/1,
  130:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/0,
  131:          signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1/1,
  132:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/0,
  133:          server_certificate_authorities_disabled/1,
  134:          legacy_server_certificate_authorities_disabled/0,

  137:          cert_auth_in_first_ca/1
  138:          ]).
  139: 
  140: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  141: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  142: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  143: 
  144: all() ->
  145:     [
  146:      {group, 'tlsv1.3'},
  147:      {group, 'tlsv1.2'},
  148:      {group, 'tlsv1.1'},
  149:      {group, 'tlsv1'},
  150:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
  151:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
  152:     ].
  153: 
  154: groups() ->
  155:     [
  156:      {'tlsv1.3', [], tls_1_3_protocol_groups()}, 
  157:      {'tlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  158:      {'tlsv1.1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  159:      {'tlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  160:      {'dtlsv1.2', [], tls_1_2_protocol_groups()},
  161:      {'dtlsv1', [], ssl_protocol_groups()},
  162:      {rsa, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer]},
  163:      {ecdsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  164:      {dsa, [], all_version_tests()},
  165:      {rsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++
  166:           tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ++ [client_auth_seelfsigned_peer, basic_rsa_1024]},
  167:      {rsa_pss_rsae, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_2_rsa_tests()},
  168:      {rsa_pss_rsae_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  169:      {rsa_pss_pss, [], all_version_tests()},
  170:      {rsa_pss_pss_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ rsa_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++ tls_1_3_rsa_tests()},
  171:      {ecdsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests() ++
  172:           [signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1,
  173:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1,
  174:            signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1]},
  175:      {eddsa_1_3, [], all_version_tests() ++ tls_1_3_tests()}
  176:     ].
  177: 
  178: ssl_protocol_groups() ->
  179:     [{group, rsa},
  180:      {group, dsa}].
  181: 
  182: tls_1_2_protocol_groups() ->
  183:     [{group, rsa},
  184:      {group, ecdsa},
  185:      {group, dsa},
  186:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae},
  187:      {group, rsa_pss_pss}
  188:     ].
  189: 
  190: tls_1_3_protocol_groups() ->
  191:     [{group, rsa_1_3},
  192:      {group, ecdsa_1_3},
  193:      {group, eddsa_1_3},
  194:      {group, rsa_pss_rsae_1_3},
  195:      {group, rsa_pss_pss_1_3}
  196:     ].
  197: 
  198: tls_1_3_tests() ->
  199:     [
  200:      hello_retry_request,
  201:      custom_groups,
  202:      client_auth_no_suitable_chain,
  203:      cert_auth_in_first_ca,
  204:      hello_retry_client_auth,
  205:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  206:      hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  207:      server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  208:     ].
  209: 
  210: pre_tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  211:     [
  212:      key_auth_ext_sign_only,
  213:      legacy_server_certificate_authorities_disabled
  214:     ].
  215: 
  216: rsa_tests() ->
  217:    [
  218:     longer_chain,
  219:     cross_signed_chain,
  220:     expired_root_with_cross_signed_root
  221:    ].
  222: 
  223: tls_1_3_rsa_tests() ->
  224:      [
  225:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  226:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  227:      ].
  228: 
  229: tls_1_2_rsa_tests() ->
  230:      [
  231:       unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth,
  232:       unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth
  233:      ].
  234: 
  235: all_version_tests() ->
  236:     [
  237:      no_auth,
  238:      auth,
  239:      client_auth_custom_key,
  240:      client_auth_empty_cert_accepted,
  241:      client_auth_empty_cert_rejected,
  242:      client_auth_use_partial_chain,
  243:      client_auth_do_not_use_partial_chain,
  244:      client_auth_partial_chain_fun_fail,
  245:      client_auth_sni,
  246:      missing_root_cert_no_auth,
  247:      missing_root_cert_auth,
  248:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept,
  249:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject,
  250:      missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept,
  251:      verify_fun_always_run_client,
  252:      verify_fun_always_run_server,
  253:      incomplete_chain_auth,
  254:      no_chain_client_auth,
  255:      invalid_signature_client,
  256:      invalid_signature_server,
  257:      critical_extension_auth,
  258:      critical_extension_client_auth,
  259:      critical_extension_no_auth,
  260:      extended_key_usage_auth,
  261:      extended_key_usage_client_auth,
  262:      cert_expired,
  263:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext,
  264:      no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment
  265:     ].
  266: 
  267: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  268:     catch application:stop(crypto),
  269:     try application:start(crypto) of
  270: 	ok ->
  271:             Config
  272:     catch _:_ ->
  273: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  274:     end.
  275: 
  276: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  277:     ssl:stop(),
  278:     application:unload(ssl),
  279:     application:stop(crypto).
  280: 
  281: 
  282: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  283:     case ssl_test_lib:is_protocol_version(GroupName) of
  284:         true  ->
  285:             ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  286:             ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName,
  287:                                         [{client_type, erlang},
  288:                                          {server_type, erlang},
  289:                                          {version, GroupName} | Config]);
  290:         false ->
  291:             do_init_per_group(GroupName, Config)
  292:     end.
  293: 
  294: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == rsa;
  295:                                        Group == rsa_1_3 ->
  296:     Config1 = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  297:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_1024_cert(Config1),
  298:     COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  299:     SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  300:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  301:     [{cert_key_alg, rsa},
  302:      {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)},
  303:      {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version)} |
  304:      lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  305:                   [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  306:                    {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  307:                    lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  308:                                 lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  309: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae;
  310:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss ->
  311:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  312:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  313:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  314: 
  315:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts)
  316:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts)
  317:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  318:         true ->
  319:             #{client_config := COpts,
  320:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  321:             [{cert_key_alg, Alg},
  322:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)},
  323:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version)} |
  324:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  325:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  326:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  327:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  328:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  329:         false ->
  330:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  331:     end;
  332: do_init_per_group(Alg, Config) when Alg == rsa_pss_rsae_1_3;
  333:                                     Alg == rsa_pss_pss_1_3 ->
  334: 
  335:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  336:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  337:     
  338:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  339:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  340:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  341:         true ->
  342:             #{client_config := COpts,
  343:               server_config := SOpts} = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_pss_pem(rsa_alg(Alg), [], Config, ""),
  344:             [{cert_key_alg, rsa_alg(Alg)} |
  345:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  346:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  347:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  348:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  349:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  350:         false ->
  351:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  352:     end;
  353: do_init_per_group(Group, Config0) when Group == ecdsa;
  354:                                        Group == ecdsa_1_3 ->
  355: 
  356:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  357:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  358:         true ->
  359:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  360:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  361:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  362:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  363:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  364:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  365:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  366:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  367:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  368:                          )];
  369:         false ->
  370:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  371:     end;
  372: do_init_per_group(eddsa_1_3, Config0) ->
  373:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  374:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config0),
  375:     case lists:member(eddsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg)) of
  376:         true ->
  377:             Conf = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  378:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  379:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()},
  380:                                                client_chain => #{root => ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf(),
  381:                                                                  intermediates => [ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()],
  382:                                                                  peer =>  ssl_test_lib:eddsa_conf()}}),
  383:             [{server_config, SOpts},
  384:              {client_config, COpts}] = x509_test:gen_pem_config_files(Conf, filename:join(PrivDir, "client_eddsa"),
  385:                                                                       filename:join(PrivDir, "server_eddsa")),
  386: 
  387:             [{cert_key_alg, eddsa} |
  388:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  389:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  390:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  391:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  392:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config0))]
  393:                          )];
  394:         false ->
  395:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  396:     end;
  397: do_init_per_group(dsa = Alg, Config0) ->
  398:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  399:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  400:     case lists:member(dss, PKAlg) andalso lists:member(dh, PKAlg) of
  401:         true ->
  402:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_dsa_cert(Config0),
  403:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_dsa_opts, Config),
  404:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_dsa_opts, Config),
  405:             ShaDSA = case Version of
  406:                          {3, 3} ->
  407:                              [{signature_algs, [{sha, dsa}]}];
  408:                          _  ->
  409:                              []
  410:                      end,
  411:             [{cert_key_alg, dsa},
  412:              {extra_client, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  413:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}] ++ ShaDSA},
  414:              {extra_server, ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(Alg, Version) ++
  415:                   [{ciphers, ssl_test_lib:dsa_suites(Version)}] ++ ShaDSA} |
  416:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  417:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> COpts end},
  418:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> SOpts end} |
  419:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  420:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))])];
  421:         false ->
  422:             {skip, "Missing DSS crypto support"}
  423:     end;
  424: do_init_per_group(_Group, Config) ->
  425:     Config.
  426: 
  427: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  428:   ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  429: 
  430: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1, Config) ->
  431:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp256r1);
  432: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1, Config) ->
  433:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp384r1);
  434: init_per_testcase(signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1, Config) ->
  435:     init_ecdsa_opts(Config, secp521r1);
  436: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  437:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  438:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 15}),
  439:     Config.
  440: 
  441: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  442:     Config.
  443: 
  444: init_ecdsa_opts(Config0, Curve) ->
  445:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config0)),
  446:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  447:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  448:         true ->
  449:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_ecdsa_cert(Config0, Curve),
  450:             COpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_ecdsa_verify_opts, Config),
  451:             SOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  452:             [{cert_key_alg, ecdsa} |
  453:              lists:delete(cert_key_alg,
  454:                           [{client_cert_opts, fun() -> ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ COpts end},
  455:                            {server_cert_opts, fun() -> ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(ecdsa, Version) ++ SOpts end} |
  456:                            lists:delete(server_cert_opts,
  457:                                         lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))]
  458:                          )];
  459:         false ->
  460:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  461:     end.
  462: 
  463: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  464: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  465: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  466: no_auth() ->
  467:      ssl_cert_tests:no_auth().
  468: 
  469: no_auth(Config) ->
  470:       ssl_cert_tests:no_auth(Config).
  471: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  472: auth() ->
  473:     ssl_cert_tests:auth().
  474: auth(Config) ->
  475:     ssl_cert_tests:auth(Config).
  476: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  477: client_auth_custom_key() ->
  478:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_custom_key().
  479: client_auth_custom_key(Config) ->
  480:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_custom_key(Config).
  481: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  482: client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
  483:     ssl_cert_tests:client_auth_empty_cert_accepted().

  531: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  532: missing_root_cert_auth() ->
  533:     [{doc,"Must have ROOT certs to be able to verify verify peer"}].
  534: missing_root_cert_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  535:     ServerOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)),
  536:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, _} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  537:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
  538:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  539: 					      {from, self()},
  540: 					      {options, no_reuse(Version) ++ [{verify, verify_peer}
  541:                                                                              | ServerOpts]}]),
  542: 
  543:     Error = {error, {options, incompatible,
  544:                      [{verify,verify_peer},{cacerts,undefined}]}},
  545:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, Error),
  546:     
  547:     ClientOpts =  proplists:delete(cacertfile, ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)),
  548:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, 0},
  549: 					      {from, self()},
  550: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer}
  551: 							 | ClientOpts]}]),
  552: 
  553:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Client, Error).
  554:     
  555: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  556: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept() ->
  557:     [{doc, "Test that the client succeeds if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  558:      " with a verify_fun that accepts the unknown CA error"}].
  559: 
  560: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  561:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  562:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  563:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  564: 			    {valid, UserState};
  565: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  566: 			    {fail, Reason};
  567: 		       (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  568: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  569: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  570: 			    {valid, UserState};
  571: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  572: 			    {valid, UserState}
  573: 		    end, []},
  574:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  575:                                           [{verify, verify_peer}, {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  576:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  577:                                           Config),
  578:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  579: 
  580: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  581: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept() ->
  582:     [{doc, "Test old style verify fun"}].
  583: 
  584: missing_root_cert_auth_user_old_verify_fun_accept(Config) ->
  585:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  586:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  587:     AcceptBadCa = fun({bad_cert,unknown_ca}, Acc) ->  Acc;
  588:                      (Other, Acc) -> [Other | Acc]
  589: 		  end,
  590:     VerifyFun =
  591: 	fun(ErrorList) ->
  592: 		case lists:foldl(AcceptBadCa, [], ErrorList) of
  593: 		    [] ->    true;
  594: 		    [_|_] -> false
  595: 		end
  596: 	end,
  597:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  598:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  599:                                            {verify_fun, VerifyFun},
  600:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}], Config),
  601:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  602: 
  603: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  604: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject() ->
  605:     [{doc, "Test that the client fails if the ROOT CA is unknown in verify_peer mode"
  606:      " with a verify_fun that rejects the unknown CA error"}].
  607: 
  608: missing_root_cert_auth_user_verify_fun_reject(Config) ->
  609:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  610:     ClientCaCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
  611:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca} = Reason, _UserState) ->
  612: 			    {fail, Reason};
  613: 		       (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  614: 			    {fail, Reason};
  615: 		       (_,{extension, UserState}, _) ->
  616: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  617: 		       (_, valid, UserState) ->
  618: 			    {valid, UserState};
  619: 		       (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  620: 			    {valid, UserState}
  621: 		    end, []},
  622:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client,
  623:                                           [{verify, verify_peer},
  624:                                            {verify_fun, FunAndState},
  625:                                            {cacerts, ClientCaCerts}],
  626:                                           Config),
  627:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unknown_ca).
  628: 
  629: 
  630: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  631: incomplete_chain_auth() ->
  632:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify an incompleat chain when we have the certs to rebuild it"}].
  633: incomplete_chain_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  634:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  635:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  636:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  637:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  638:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  639:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  640:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),   
  641:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  642:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  643:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  644:                                                          {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
  645:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  646:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  647:                                                          {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
  648:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  649:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  650: 
  651: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  652: no_chain_client_auth() ->
  653:     [{doc,"In TLS-1.3 test that we allow sending only peer cert if chain CAs are missing and hence"
  654:       " we can not determine if client is in servers auth domain or not, so send and hope"
  655:       " that the cert chain is in the auth domain and that the server possess "
  656:       " intermediates to recreate the chain."}].
  657: no_chain_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  658:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  659:     Group = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  660:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(Group),
  661:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  662:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  663:                                                                         [{server_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  664:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  665:     ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
  666:     [ClientRoot| _] = ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
  667:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
  668:                                                          {cacerts, [ClientRoot]} |
  669:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)], Config),
  670:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer},
  671:                                                          {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  672:                                                          {cacerts,  ClientCas ++ ServerCas} |
  673:                                                          proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)], Config),
  674:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  675: 
  676: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  677: verify_fun_always_run_client() ->
  678:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  679:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  680: 
  681: verify_fun_always_run_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  682:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  683:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  684:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  685:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  686:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  687: 					      {from, self()},
  688: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  689: 						     no_result, []}},
  690: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  691:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  692: 
  693:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  694:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  695:     %% to call users verify fun
  696:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  697:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  698: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  699: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  700:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  701: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  702: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  703:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  704: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  705: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  706:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  707: 			    {valid, UserState}
  708: 		    end, [0]},
  709: 
  710:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  711: 					      {host, Hostname},
  712: 					      {from, self()},
  713: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  714: 						     no_result, []}},
  715: 					      {options,
  716: 					       [{verify, verify_peer},
  717: 						{verify_fun, FunAndState}
  718: 						| ClientOpts]}]),
  719: 
  720:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  721: 
  722: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  723: verify_fun_always_run_server() ->
  724:     [{doc,"Verify that user verify_fun is always run (for valid and "
  725:       "valid_peer not only unknown_extension)"}].
  726: verify_fun_always_run_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  727:     ClientOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  728:     ServerOpts =  ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  729:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  730: 
  731:     %% If user verify fun is called correctly we fail the connection.
  732:     %% otherwise we cannot tell this case apart form where we miss
  733:     %% to call users verify fun
  734:     FunAndState =  {fun(_, Der, {extension, _}, UserState) ->
  735:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  736: 			    {unknown, UserState};
  737: 		       (_, Der, valid, [ChainLen]) ->
  738:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  739: 			    {valid, [ChainLen + 1]};
  740: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, [1]) ->
  741:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  742: 			    {fail, "verify_fun_was_always_run"};
  743: 		       (_, Der, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  744:                             true = is_binary(Der),
  745: 			    {valid, UserState}
  746: 		    end, [0]},
  747: 
  748:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  749:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  750: 					      {from, self()},
  751: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  752: 						     no_result, []}},
  753: 					      {options,
  754:                                                no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer},
  755:                                                                                 {verify_fun, FunAndState} |
  756:                                                                                 ServerOpts]}]),
  757:     Port  = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  758: 
  759:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  760: 					      {host, Hostname},
  761: 					      {from, self()},
  762: 					      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,
  763: 						     no_result, []}},
  764: 					      {options, ClientOpts}]),
  765:     
  766:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, handshake_failure).
  767: 
  768: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------

  781: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  782: critical_extension_auth() ->
  783:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  784: 
  785: critical_extension_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  786:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  787:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  788:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  789:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  790:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  791:                                                                          [{server_chain, 
  792:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  793:                                                                           {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  794:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  795:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  796:  
  797:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  798:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  799:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  800:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  801:                 {from, self()},
  802:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib,  no_result, []}},
  803:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  804:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  805:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  806:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  807:                 {host, Hostname},
  808:                 {from, self()},
  809:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  810:                 {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  811: 
  812:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  813: 
  814: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  815: critical_extension_client_auth() ->
  816:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical unknown extension in verify_peer mode"}].
  817: 
  818: critical_extension_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  819:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  820:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  821:      #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  822:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  823:                                                                          [{client_chain, 
  824:                                                                            [[],[],[{extensions, Ext}]]},
  825:                                                                           {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  826:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  827:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  828:     
  829:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  830:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  831:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error(
  832:                [{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  833:                 {from, self()},
  834:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  835:                 {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  836:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  837:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error(
  838:                [{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  839:                 {host, Hostname},
  840:                 {from, self()},
  841:                 {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  842:                 {options, [{verify, verify_none} | ClientOpts]}]),
  843: 
  844:     %% This certificate has a critical extension that we don't
  845:     %% understand.  Therefore, verification should fail.          
  846:     ssl_test_lib:check_server_alert(Server, Client, unsupported_certificate).
  847:

  855:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{{2,16,840,1,113730,1,1}, <<3,2,6,192>>, true}]),
  856:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  857:       server_config := ServerOpts0}  = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  858:                                                                             [{server_chain,

  867: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  868: extended_key_usage_auth() ->
  869:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in server cert"}].
  870: 
  871: extended_key_usage_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  872:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  873:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  874:     Ext = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  875:                                  [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  876:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  877:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  878:                                                                         [{server_chain, 
  879:                                                                           [[],[], [{extensions, Ext}]]},
  880:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}
  881:                                                                         ]),
  882:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  883:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  884: 
  885:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  886:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  887:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  888: 					{from, self()},
  889:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  890: 			   {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_none} | ServerOpts]}]),
  891:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  892:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  893: 					{host, Hostname},
  894: 			   {from, self()},
  895:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  896: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} |
  897: 						   ClientOpts]}]),
  898:     
  899:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  900: 
  901:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  902:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  903: 
  904: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  905: extended_key_usage_client_auth() ->
  906:     [{doc,"Test cert that has a critical extended_key_usage extension in client and server cert"}].
  907: 
  908: extended_key_usage_client_auth(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  909:     ServerExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  910:                                        [?'id-kp-serverAuth'], true}]),
  911:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  912:                                        [?'id-kp-clientAuth'], true}]),
  913:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  914:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  915:                                                                         [{client_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
  916:                                                                          {server_chain, [[],[],[{extensions, ServerExt}]]}]),
  917:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  918:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  919:    
  920:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  921:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  922:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  923: 					{from, self()},
  924:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  925:                                         {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ [{verify, verify_peer} | ServerOpts]}]),
  926:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  927:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  928: 					{host, Hostname},
  929: 			   {from, self()},
  930: 			   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  931: 					{options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),
  932:     
  933:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok),
  934: 
  935:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  936:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client).
  937: 
  938: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  939: cert_expired() ->
  940:     [{doc,"Test server with expired certificate"}].
  941: 
  942: cert_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  943:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  944:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_ecc_cert_chain_conf(proplists:get_value(name, Prop)),
  945:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  946:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  947:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  948:                                                                         [{server_chain,
  949:                                                                           [[],
  950:                                                                            [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
  951:                                                                                         {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
  952:                                                                            []
  953:                                                                      ]},
  954:                                                                          {client_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  955:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config),
  956:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config),
  957:     
  958:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  959:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
  960:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server_error([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  961: 					      {from, self()},
  962: 					      {options, no_reuse(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version)) ++ ServerOpts}]),
  963:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  964:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client_error([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  965: 					      {host, Hostname},
  966: 					      {from, self()},
  967: 					      {options, [{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts]}]),    
  968:     
  969:     ssl_test_lib:check_client_alert(Server, Client, certificate_expired).
  970: 
  971: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  972: no_auth_key_identifier_ext() ->
  973:     [{doc, "Test cert that does not have authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  974: 
  975: no_auth_key_identifier_ext(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  976:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
  977:       #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  978:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  979:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  980:                                           [{client_chain, DefaultCertConf},
  981:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}]),
  982:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
  983:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
  984:  
  985:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  986:     
  987: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  988: no_auth_key_identifier_ext_keyEncipherment() ->
  989:     [{doc, "Test cert with keyEncipherment key_usage an no"
  990:       " authorityKeyIdentifier extension"}].
  991:

  993:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),

  995:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  996:         server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
  997:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
  998:                                           [{client_chain, 
  999:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1000:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1001:                                           ]),
 1002:     ClientOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1003:     ServerOpts =   [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1004:     
 1005:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).

 1008: key_auth_ext_sign_only() ->
 1009:     [{doc, "Test that client with a certificate without keyEncipherment usage "
 1010:     " extension can connect to a server with restricted cipher suites "}].
 1011: key_auth_ext_sign_only(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1012:     DefaultCertConf = ssl_test_lib:default_cert_chain_conf(),
 1013:     ClientExt = x509_test:extensions([{key_usage, [digitalSignature]}]),
 1014:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
 1015:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = 
 1016:         ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(proplists:get_value(cert_key_alg, Config),
 1017:                                           [{client_chain, 
 1018:                                             [[],[],[{extensions, ClientExt}]]},
 1019:                                            {server_chain, DefaultCertConf}
 1020:                                           ]),
 1021:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1022:     ClientOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, ClientOpts0, Config)],
 1023:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {ciphers, 
 1024:                                           ssl_test_lib:rsa_non_signed_suites(ssl_test_lib:n_version(Version))} 
 1025:                  | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, ServerOpts0, Config)],
 1026:     
 1027:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1028: 
 1029: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1030: cert_auth_in_first_ca() ->
 1031:     [{doc,"Test cert auth will be available in first ca in chain, make it happen by only having one"}].
 1032: cert_auth_in_first_ca(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1033:     #{} =
 1034:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1035:                                                       intermediates => [[]],
 1036:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1037:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}], 
 1038:                                                       intermediates => [[]],
 1039:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}), 
 1040:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config)],
 1041:     ServerOpts =  [{verify, verify_peer} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config)],
 1042: 
 1043:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1044:

 1047: 
 1048: longer_chain() ->
 1049:     [{doc,"Test depth option"}].
 1050: longer_chain(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1051:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0,
 1052:       client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1053:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}],
 1054:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}],
 1055:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1056:                                                                         [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4)}]],
 1057:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}]},
 1058:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3)}],
 1059:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2)}]],
 1060:                                                       peer => [{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]}}),
 1061:     [ServerRoot| _] = ServerCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1062:     ClientCas = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1063:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1064:     
 1065:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer}, {cacerts, [ServerRoot]} |
 1066:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ServerOpts0)] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version), Config),
 1067:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer},
 1068:                                            {depth, 5},
 1069:                                            {cacerts,  ServerCas ++ ClientCas} |
 1070:                                            proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts0)]++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) , Config),
 1071:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1072: 
 1073: cross_signed_chain() ->
 1074:     [{doc, "Manual test of chain with duplicate entries that is cross signing certs are present."}].
 1075: cross_signed_chain(Config)
 1076:   when is_list(Config) ->
 1077:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1078:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1079:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1080:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1081:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1082: 
 1083:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1084:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1085:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1086:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key3}],
 1087:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1088:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1089: 
 1090:     #{client_config := ClientOptsNew} =
 1091:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => [{key, Key1}],
 1092:                                                       peer => [{key, Key5}]},
 1093:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key4}],
 1094:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key1}]],
 1095:                                                       peer => [{key, Key1}]}}),
 1096: 
 1097:     ServerCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts0),
 1098:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts0),
 1099:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1100: 
 1101:     {[Peer,CI1,CI2,CROld], CROld} = chain_and_root(ClientOpts0),
 1102:     {[_Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CRNew], CRNew} = chain_and_root(ClientOptsNew),
 1103: 
 1104:     ServerCas = [CRNew|ServerCas0 -- [CROld]],
 1105:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1106:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1, ServerOpts0, {cacerts, ServerCas})]
 1107:                                           ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1108:                                           Config),
 1109:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1110:                                                          lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1111:                                                                           lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1112:                                                                              {cert, [Peer,CI1New,CI2New,CI1,CI2,CRNew,CROld]}),
 1113:                                                                           {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1114:                                           Config),
 1115:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
 1116:     ClientOpts2 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, [{verify, verify_peer} |
 1117:                                                           lists:keyreplace(cacerts, 1,
 1118:                                                                            lists:keyreplace(cert, 1, ClientOpts0,
 1119:                                                                                             {cert, [Peer,CI1,CI1New,CI2,CI2New,CROld,CRNew]}),
 1120:                                                                            {cacerts, ClientCas0})] ++ ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version),
 1121:                                            Config),
 1122:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts2, ServerOpts, Config),
 1123:     ok.
 1124: 
 1125: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root() ->
 1126:     [{doc,"Test that we can verify a chain with an expired Root Cert if there is an alternative chain with"
 1127:       " a cross signed Root CA further down the chain that is however not present in the sent chain"}].
 1128: expired_root_with_cross_signed_root(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1129: 
 1130:     Key1 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(1),
 1131:     Key2 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(2),
 1132:     Key3 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(3),
 1133:     Key4 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(4),
 1134:     Key5 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5),
 1135:     Key6 = ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6),
 1136:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1137: 
 1138:     %% Create expired ROOT
 1139:     #{cert := Root} = SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{key, Key1},
 1140:                                                                     {validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day},
 1141:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
 1142:     #{server_config := ServerOpts0, client_config := ClientOpts0} =
 1143:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
 1144:                                                       intermediates => [[{key, Key2}], [{key, Key3}]],
 1145:                                                       peer => [{key, Key4}]},
 1146:                                     client_chain => #{root => [{key, Key5}],
 1147:                                                       peer => [{key, Key6}]}}),
 1148:     Version = ssl_test_lib:n_version(proplists:get_value(version, Config)),
 1149:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ClientOpts0,
 1150:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:sig_algs(rsa, Version) ++ ServerOpts0,
 1151: 
 1152:     SCert = proplists:get_value(cert, ServerOpts),
 1153:     SCerts = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerOpts),
 1154: 
 1155:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, SCerts}),
 1156:     {ok, Root, [_Peer, CA1, CA2, Root]} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(SCert, ets:new(foo, []), 
 1157:                                                                             ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1158: 
 1159:     OTPCA1 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA1, otp),
 1160:     OTPCA2 = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CA2, otp),
 1161: 
 1162:     TBS1 = OTPCA1#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1163:     TBS2 = OTPCA2#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
 1164: 
 1165:     Issuer = TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
 1166: 
 1167:     SubjectPublicKeyInfo = TBS2#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subjectPublicKeyInfo,
 1168: 
 1169:     AltCrossRoot = public_key:pkix_sign(TBS1#'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Issuer,
 1170:                                                                  subjectPublicKeyInfo = SubjectPublicKeyInfo}, Key2),
 1171: 
 1172:     ClientCas0 = proplists:get_value(cacerts, ClientOpts),
 1173: 
 1174:     %% Only expired ROOT present
 1175:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert([{verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts], ServerOpts, Config, certificate_expired),
 1176:     %% Only CROSS ROOT present
 1177:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1178:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)], ServerOpts, Config),
 1179:     %% Both expired ROOT and CROSS ROOT present
 1180:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{verify, verify_peer},
 1181:                              {cacerts, [AltCrossRoot | ClientCas0]} | proplists:delete(cacerts, ClientOpts)],
 1182:                             ServerOpts, Config).
 1183: 
 1184: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1185: %% TLS 1.3 Test cases  -----------------------------------------------
 1186: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1187: hello_retry_request() ->
 1188:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can request a new group when the client's first key share"
 1189:       "is not supported"}].
 1190: 
 1191: hello_retry_request(Config) ->
 1192:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1193:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1194:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1195:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1196:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1197:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]} | ClientOpts0],
 1198:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1199: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1200: custom_groups() ->
 1201:     [{doc,"Test that ssl server can select a common group for key-exchange"}].
 1202: 
 1203: custom_groups(Config) ->
 1204:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1205:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1206: 
 1207:     %% Set versions
 1208:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1209:                   {supported_groups, [x448, secp256r1, secp384r1]}|ServerOpts0],
 1210:     ClientOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1211:     ClientOpts = [{supported_groups,[secp384r1, secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts1],
 1212:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1213: 
 1214: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1215: %% Triggers a Server Alert as ssl client does not have a certificate with a
 1216: %% signature algorithm supported by the server (signature_algorithms_cert extension
 1217: %% of CertificateRequest does not contain the algorithm of the client certificate).
 1218: %% ssl client sends an empty certificate.
 1219: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth() ->
 1220:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2) : Test client authentication with unsupported "
 1221:        "signature_algorithm_cert"}].
 1222: 
 1223: unsupported_sign_algo_cert_client_auth(Config) ->
 1224:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1225:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1226:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1227:                   {signature_algs,
 1228:                    [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1229:                   %% Skip rsa_pkcs1_sha256!
 1230:                   {signature_algs_cert, [rsa_pkcs1_sha384, rsa_pkcs1_sha512]},
 1231:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1232:     Version = proplists:get_value(version, Config),
 1233:     case Version of
 1234:         'tlsv1.3' ->
 1235:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required);
 1236:         _  ->
 1237:             ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, unsupported_certificate)
 1238:     end.
 1239: 
 1240: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1241: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth() ->
 1242:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (backported to TLS-1.2): Test client authentication with unsupported signature_algorithm"}].
 1243: 
 1244: unsupported_sign_algo_client_auth(Config) ->
 1245:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1246:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1247:     ClientOpts = [{signature_algs, [rsa_pkcs1_sha256, rsa_pss_rsae_sha256]} | ClientOpts0],
 1248:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1249:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_sha1, rsa_pss_pss_sha256]},
 1250:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}|ServerOpts0],
 1251:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1252: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1253: hello_retry_client_auth() ->
 1254:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication."}].
 1255: 
 1256: hello_retry_client_auth(Config) ->
 1257:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1258:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1259:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1260:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1261:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1262:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts0],
 1263:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1264:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1265: 
 1266:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1267: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1268: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted() ->
 1269:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client sends an empty " 
 1270:        "certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1271: 
 1272: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_accepted(Config) ->
 1273:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1274:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1275:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1276:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1277: 
 1278:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1279:     %% Set versions
 1280:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1281:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1282:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, false},
 1283:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1284:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1285:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1286:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1287: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1288: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected() ->
 1289:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3 (HelloRetryRequest): Test client authentication when client "
 1290:        "sends an empty certificate and fail_if_no_peer_cert is set to true."}].
 1291: 
 1292: hello_retry_client_auth_empty_cert_rejected(Config) ->
 1293:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1294:     %% Delete Client Cert and Key
 1295:     ClientOpts1 = proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0),
 1296:     ClientOpts2 = proplists:delete(keyfile, ClientOpts1),
 1297: 
 1298:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1299:     %% Set versions
 1300:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1301:                   {verify, verify_peer},
 1302:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1303:                   {supported_groups, [x448, x25519]}|ServerOpts0],
 1304:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1305:                   {supported_groups, [secp256r1, x25519]}|ClientOpts2],
 1306:    
 1307:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required).
 1308: 
 1309: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1310: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1() ->
 1311:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1312:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1313: 
 1314: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp256r1(Config) ->
 1315:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1316:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1317:     %% Set versions
 1318:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1319:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1320:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1321:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1322:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1323: 
 1324:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1325: 
 1326: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1327: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1() ->
 1328:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1329:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1330: 
 1331: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp384r1(Config) ->
 1332:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1333:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1334:     %% Set versions
 1335:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts0],
 1336:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1337:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1338:                                     ecdsa_secp521r1_sha512,
 1339:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1340: 
 1341:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1342: 
 1343: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1344: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1() ->
 1345:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Test that the the client fails to connect "
 1346:        "if server's certificate has a key using an unsupported curve."}].
 1347: 
 1348: signature_algorithms_bad_curve_secp521r1(Config) ->
 1349:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1350:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1351:     %% Set versions
 1352:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1353:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp512r1_sha256,
 1354:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}
 1355:                  | ServerOpts0],
 1356:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
 1357:                   {signature_algs, [ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
 1358:                                     ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
 1359:                                     {sha256,rsa}]}|ClientOpts0],
 1360:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
 1361: 
 1362: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1363: basic_rsa_1024() ->
 1364:     [{doc, "TLS 1.3 (Basic): Test if connection can be established using 1024 bits RSA keys in certificates."}].
 1365: 
 1366: basic_rsa_1024(Config) ->
 1367:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1368:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_1024_opts, Config),
 1369:     ServerOpts1 = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ServerOpts0],
 1370:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']}|ClientOpts0],
 1371:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
 1372:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} | ServerOpts1],
 1373:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
 1374: 
 1375: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1376: server_certificate_authorities_disabled() ->
 1377:      [{doc,"TLS 1.3: Disabling certificate_authorities extension on the server when verify_peer is set to true"
 1378:        " allows the client to send a chain that could be verifiable by the server but that would not adhere to"
 1379:        " the certificate_authorities extension as it is not part of the regular trusted certificate set"}].
 1380: 
 1381: server_certificate_authorities_disabled(Config) ->
 1382:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1383:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1384: 
 1385:     % Strip out the ClientRoot to simulate cases where the they are manually managed and
 1386:     % not expected to be included in certificate requests during mutual authentication.
 1387:     {ok, CACerts0} = ssl_pkix_db:decode_pem_file(proplists:get_value(cacertfile, ServerOpts0)),
 1388:     [_ClientRoot | ServerCACerts] = [CertDER || {_, CertDER, _} <- CACerts0],
 1389: 
 1390:     FunAndState =  {fun(_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1391:                             {unknown, UserState};
 1392:                        (_, valid, UserState) ->
 1393:                             {valid, UserState};
 1394:                        % Because this is a manually managed setup, we also need to manually verify
 1395:                        % an unknown_ca (ClientCert) as expected. Typically you would have custom logic
 1396:                        % here to decide if you know the cert (like looking up pinned values in a DB)
 1397:                        % but for testing purposes, we'll allow everything
 1398:                        (_, {bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
 1399:                             {valid, UserState};
 1400:                        (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
 1401:                             {valid, UserState}
 1402:                     end, [0]},
 1403: 
 1404:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer} | ClientOpts0],
 1405:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {verify, verify_peer},
 1406:                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}, {cacerts, ServerCACerts},
 1407:                   {verify_fun, FunAndState} | ServerOpts0],
 1408:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, certificate_required),
 1409:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, [{certificate_authorities, false} | ServerOpts], Config).
 1410: 
 1411: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1412: legacy_server_certificate_authorities_disabled() ->
 1413:      [{doc,"Test that code pre TLS-1.3 can send an empty list for certificate authorities in the certificate request"
 1414:        "will be run and not fail, black box verification is not possible without strict legacy client, but code coverage will show that right thing happens"}].
 1415: 
 1416: legacy_server_certificate_authorities_disabled(Config) ->
 1417:     Version = proplists:get_value(version,Config),
 1418:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
 1419:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
 1420:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test([{versions, [Version]} | ClientOpts], [{versions, [Version]}, {verify, verify_peer},
 1421:                                                                   {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
 1422:                                                                   {certificate_authorities, false} | ServerOpts], Config).
 1423: 
 1424: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1425: %% Internal functions  -----------------------------------------------
 1426: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1427: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_rsae_1_3) ->
 1428:     rsa_pss_rsae;
 1429: rsa_alg(rsa_pss_pss_1_3) ->
 1430:     rsa_pss_pss;
 1431: rsa_alg(Atom) ->
 1432:     Atom.
 1433: 
 1434: no_reuse(?TLS_1_3) ->
 1435:     [];
 1436: no_reuse(_) ->
 1437:     [{reuse_sessions, false}].
 1438: 
 1439: chain_and_root(Config) ->
 1440:     OwnCert = proplists:get_value(cert, Config),
 1441:     {ok, ExtractedCAs} = ssl_pkix_db:extract_trusted_certs({der, proplists:get_value(cacerts, Config)}),
 1442:     {ok, Root, Chain} = ssl_certificate:certificate_chain(OwnCert, ets:new(foo, []), ExtractedCAs, [], encoded),
 1443:     {Chain, Root}.
 1444:
